notes.text: Security update for chromium
notes.title: Title of the patch

notes.text:
This update for chromium fixes the following issues:

Chromium 106.0.5249.91 (boo#1203808):

* CVE-2022-3370: Use after free in Custom Elements
* CVE-2022-3373: Out of bounds write in V8

Uncludes changes from 106.0.5249.61:

* CVE-2022-3304: Use after free in CSS
* CVE-2022-3201: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in Developer Tools
* CVE-2022-3305: Use after free in Survey
* CVE-2022-3306: Use after free in Survey
* CVE-2022-3307: Use after free in Media
* CVE-2022-3308: Insufficient policy enforcement in Developer Tools
* CVE-2022-3309: Use after free in Assistant
* CVE-2022-3310: Insufficient policy enforcement in Custom Tabs
* CVE-2022-3311: Use after free in Import
* CVE-2022-3312: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in VPN
* CVE-2022-3313: Incorrect security UI in Full Screen
* CVE-2022-3314: Use after free in Logging
* CVE-2022-3315: Type confusion in Blink
* CVE-2022-3316: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in Safe Browsing
* CVE-2022-3317: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in Intents
* CVE-2022-3318: Use after free in ChromeOS Notifications
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: openSUSE-2022-10139

notes.text: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in DevTools in Google Chrome on Chrome OS prior to 105.0.5195.125 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extension to bypass navigation restrictions via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)
notes.title: Vulnerability description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".

notes.text: Use after free in CSS in Google Chrome prior to 106.0.5249.62 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)
notes.title: Vulnerability description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".

notes.text: Use after free in survey in Google Chrome on ChromeOS prior to 106.0.5249.62 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)
notes.title: Vulnerability description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".

notes.text: Use after free in survey in Google Chrome on ChromeOS prior to 106.0.5249.62 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)
notes.title: Vulnerability description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".

notes.text: Use after free in media in Google Chrome prior to 106.0.5249.62 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)
notes.title: Vulnerability description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".

notes.text: Insufficient policy enforcement in developer tools in Google Chrome prior to 106.0.5249.62 allowed a remote attacker to potentially perform a sandbox escape via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)
notes.title: Vulnerability description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".

notes.text: Use after free in assistant in Google Chrome on ChromeOS prior to 106.0.5249.62 allowed a remote attacker who convinced a user to engage in specific UI gestures to potentially perform a sandbox escape via specific UI gestures. (Chromium security severity: Medium)
notes.title: Vulnerability description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".

notes.text: Insufficient policy enforcement in custom tabs in Google Chrome on Android prior to 106.0.5249.62 allowed an attacker who convinced the user to install an application to bypass same origin policy via a crafted application. (Chromium security severity: Medium)
notes.title: Vulnerability description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".

notes.text: Use after free in import in Google Chrome prior to 106.0.5249.62 allowed a remote attacker who had compromised a WebUI process to potentially perform a sandbox escape via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)
notes.title: Vulnerability description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".

notes.text: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in VPN in Google Chrome on ChromeOS prior to 106.0.5249.62 allowed a local attacker to bypass managed device restrictions via physical access to the device. (Chromium security severity: Medium)
notes.title: Vulnerability description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".

notes.text: Incorrect security UI in full screen in Google Chrome prior to 106.0.5249.62 allowed a remote attacker to spoof security UI via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)
notes.title: Vulnerability description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".

notes.text: Use after free in logging in Google Chrome prior to 106.0.5249.62 allowed a remote attacker who had compromised a WebUI process to potentially perform a sandbox escape via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)
notes.title: Vulnerability description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".

notes.text: Type confusion in Blink in Google Chrome prior to 106.0.5249.62 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Low)
notes.title: Vulnerability description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".

notes.text: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in Safe Browsing in Google Chrome prior to 106.0.5249.62 allowed a remote attacker to bypass security feature via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Low)

notes.text: Use after free in ChromeOS Notifications in Google Chrome on ChromeOS prior to 106.0.5249.62 allowed a remote attacker who convinced a user to reboot Chrome OS to potentially exploit heap corruption via UI interaction. (Chromium security severity: Low)
notes.title: Vulnerability description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".

notes.text: Out of bounds write in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 106.0.5249.91 allowed a remote attacker to perform an out of bounds memory write via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)
